SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AssetSetter
A class used to fill the obj array and set the objects position
CollisionCheck
A base class to check if the player hit a wall or an object.
Entity
A base class for entities in the game (such as player).
GamePanel
A panel for the game that handles all of the game logic, drawing, and input.
KeyHandler
A class for handling keyboard input in the game.
Main
The main that make the game work.
Maze
Class representing a maze.
OBJ_Banana
The banana object the player have to pick to win contain the image of the banana, and if the collision is enabled
Player
A player character in the game.
SuperObject
Super object representating an item such as the banana
Tile
A tile object contening the image of the tile and if there's collision for this type of tiles
TileManager
Class for managing the tiles in the maze game.
UI
The UI class is responsible for handling the visual aspects of the game, such as displaying the title screen and the win/lose screens.
